title: Blue Goo
itunes:author: Loud Speakers Network
itunes:summary:
This week on #TheFriendZone, it’s a shoot the shit episode. No hot button. No segments. Just whatever comes up. Brace yourself.

Black Business of the Week - Jesse Boykins III Merch Shop https://jesseloves.earth

(Bonus) Black Business of the Week - Black Stationary Brand https://berootedco.com is now available at Target and on Target.com

Thank you to our Sponsors:
American Express - Built To Last is a podcast by American Express that highlights the stories, history, and continued legacy of Black-owned small businesses that shape American culture. Check out the debut season of Built To Last on Spotify, Apple, YouTube or wherever you get your favorite podcasts.

CBC’s The Block - Canada has a new home for Black music. The Block is a national radio show celebrating hip-hop and the music at its heartbeat. Funk, Soul, Reggae, Afropop, R&B. It’s the music that’s shaped the culture for generations past, present, and future. Hosted by Angeline Tetteh-Wayoe. Weeknights at 7 on CBC Music and the CBC listen app 

Cricket Wireless - It’s a new year and it’s time for new possibilities and do we ever need them! Cricket Wireless can help you make the easy switch to the mobile plan that’s right for you, starting at $30 a month. Smile and switch to Cricket. Activation and other fees and restrictions apply. Terms subject to  change. See store for details. 

JUSTEgg - You can find JUST Egg pretty much anywhere – at most grocery stores including Whole Foods, Walmart, and Kroger – and on Amazon Prime Now or Instacart. JUST Egg: a better egg for you and your family. 

Honey - Get Honey for FREE at https://www.joinhoney.com/FRIENDZONE. 

HelloFresh - Go to https://www.hellofresh.com/friendzone12 and use code FRIENDZONE12 for 12 free meals, including free shipping. 

Follow us online:
Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/friendzonepod
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/thefriendzonepodcast

Have a GREAT day!
